channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 12:39 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further reports.
item.description: 🟢 12:39 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 12:39 WARNING! DRAWING DRONNES-Kamikadze
item.description: 🟢 12:39 WARNING! DRAWING DRONNES-Kamikadze #m_nikopol_that_nikopol_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 12:37 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
